item.title: shared memory utilities
item.description: Table of Contents 1 RTFM… 1.1 ipcs 1.2 ipcrm 2 Check shared memory in Linux 1 RTFM… 1.1 ipcs 1.2 ipcrm 2 Check shared memory in Linux Print active shared memory segments using -m option. 1 2 3 4 5 # ipcs -m ------ Shared Memory Segments -------- key shmid owner perms bytes nattch status 0x00000000 65536 root 600 393216 2 dest 0x00000000 98305 root 600 393216 2 dest where,
